meanings.sent1: The overmelted ice cream was a sticky mess.
meanings.sent2: The overmelted candle left a puddle of wax on the table.
meanings.sent3: The overmelted chocolate turned into a gooey disaster.
meanings.sent4: The overmelted cheese oozed out of the sandwich.
meanings.sent5: The overmelted plastic formed a misshapen blob.

meanings.sent1: She overmelted the chocolate for the cake.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally overmelted the butter for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The chef overmelted the cheese until it was a gooey mess.
meanings.sent4: The sun overmelted the ice cream cone in her hand.
meanings.sent5: The fire overmelted the plastic toy into a puddle.

meanings.sent1: The snowman overmelted in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: The candle overmelted and dripped wax everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate overmelted in the microwave and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: The ice cream overmelted in the hot car during summer.
meanings.sent5: The plastic overmelted when exposed to high temperatures.
